mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seal_box ( box_code,seal_code, create_site_code,receive_site_code, create_user_code, create_user, update_user_code, update_user, create_time, update_time, yn) VALUES ( -- SEQ_SEAL_BOX.NEXTVAL, #{boxCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receiveSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUserCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUserCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(), NOW(), 1)

INSERT INTO seal_box ( box_code, seal_code, create_site_code,receive_site_code, create_user_code, create_user, update_user_code, update_user, create_time, update_time, yn) VALUES ( #{boxCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receiveSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUserCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUserCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE seal_box SET receive_site_code = #{receiveSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_user_code = #{updateUserCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = NOW() WHERE seal_code = #{code}

UPDATE seal_box
create_site_code = #{createSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_user_code = #{createUserCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receive_site_code = #{receiveSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_user_code = #{updateUserCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE seal_code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and yn = 1
mapper.select: SELECT system_id, box_code, seal_code, create_site_code, receive_site_code, create_user_code, create_user, create_time, update_user_code, update_user, update_time FROM seal_box WHERE seal_code = #{sealCode} LIMIT 1
select SEAL_CODE,create_time from (SELECT seal_code,create_time FROM seal_box WHERE box_code = #{boxCode} order by create_time desc ) a LIMIT 1
